title: [1.6.4~1.7.2][ssp/smp]车辆Dirtbike Mod - v1.1.2[未汉化]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1207741285 于 2014-2-7 17:40 编辑 

Mod中有自行车摩托车等车辆！
[sheenrox82]作者更新信息[意见不要看，你看也看不懂]






forgot to mention.... (v1.1.3pre) : 2 days ago2/04/14I have an alpha build out for this mod, it's v1.1.3pre for Minecraft 1.7.2. Feel free to download it and test it out. It's not for gameplay purposes, just testing.

v1.1.2 : 3 days ago2/03/14First update in 5 months..Fixes and stuff...


v1.1.1 : 5 months ago8/30/13Fixes major bug with flying issue.

New bikes! : 5 months ago8/27/13New bikes have been added, recipes have changed.


有了摩托车[Dirtbike Mod]以后妈妈不用担心我上学到不了学校了！ 
下载地址：



Dirtbike Mod - v1.1.2.zip
(948.14 KB, 下载次数: 14361)



2014-2-7 17:14 上传
点击文件名下载附件
摩托车Mod下载





安装方法：直接将压缩包放进Mod文件夹（需要API支持）
等待大神汉化吧！！
